44 xta_transaction_manager_t *xta_transaction_manager_new(void)
45 {
46  enum Exception { G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR
47  , CLIENT_CONFIG_ERROR
48  , NONE } excp;
49  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
50  xta_transaction_manager_t *this = NULL;
51 
52  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_manager_new\n"));
53  TRY {
54  /* allocate the object */
55  if (NULL == (this = (xta_transaction_manager_t *)
56  g_try_malloc0(sizeof(xta_transaction_manager_t))))
57  THROW(G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR);
58  /* initialize the mutex */
59  g_mutex_init(&this->mutex);
60  /* configure the global config for LIXA client (if necessary) */
61  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = client_config(&global_ccc, TRUE)))
62  THROW(CLIENT_CONFIG_ERROR);
63  THROW(NONE);
64  } CATCH {
65  switch (excp) {
66  case G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR:
67  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR;
68  break;
69  case CLIENT_CONFIG_ERROR:
70  break;
71  case NONE:
72  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
73  break;
74  default:
75  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
76  } /* switch (excp) */
77  } /* TRY-CATCH */
78  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_manager_new/excp=%d/"
79  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
80  return this;
81 }
82 
83 
84 
85 void xta_transaction_manager_delete(xta_transaction_manager_t *tm)
86 {
87  enum Exception { CLIENT_UNCONFIG_ERROR
88  , NONE } excp;
89  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
90 
91  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_manager_delete\n"));
92  TRY {
93  /* configure the global config for LIXA client (if necessary) */
94  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = client_unconfig(&global_ccc, TRUE)))
95  THROW(CLIENT_UNCONFIG_ERROR);
96  /* destroy transaction objects if any */
97  if (NULL != tm->transactions) {
98  g_hash_table_destroy(tm->transactions);
99  tm->transactions = NULL;
100  } /* if (NULL != tm->transactions) */
101 
102  /* clear the synchronization mutex */
103  g_mutex_clear(&tm->mutex);
104 
105  /* destroy the object itself */
106  g_free(tm);
107 
108  THROW(NONE);
109  } CATCH {
110  switch (excp) {
111  case CLIENT_UNCONFIG_ERROR:
112  break;
113  case NONE:
114  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
115  break;
116  default:
117  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
118  } /* switch (excp) */
119  } /* TRY-CATCH */
120  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_manager_delete/excp=%d/"
121  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
122  return;
123 }
124

126 
127 xta_transaction_manager_config_t *
128 xta_transaction_manager_get_config(void) {
129  return &global_ccc;
130 }

133 
134 xta_transaction_t *
135 xta_transaction_manager_create_transaction(xta_transaction_manager_t *tm)
136 {
137  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT1
138  , G_HASH_TABLE_NEW_ERROR
139  , NULL_OBJECT2
140  , INTERNAL_ERROR
141  , NONE } excp;
142  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
143  xta_transaction_t *tx = NULL;
144 
145  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_manager_create_transaction\n"));
146  TRY {
147  GThread *self = g_thread_self();
148 
149  /* check object reference */
150  if (NULL == tm)
151  THROW(NULL_OBJECT1);
152 
153  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_manager_create_transaction: "
154  "locking mutex...\n"));
155  g_mutex_lock(&tm->mutex);
156 
157  /* check if the hash table as been already created */
158  if (NULL == tm->transactions) {
159  if (NULL == (tm->transactions = g_hash_table_new_full(
160  NULL, NULL, NULL,
161  (GDestroyNotify)xta_transaction_delete)))
162  THROW(G_HASH_TABLE_NEW_ERROR);
163  } /* if (NULL == tm->transactions) */
164 
165  /* look for transaction in hash table */
166  if (NULL == (tx = g_hash_table_lookup(tm->transactions, self))) {
167  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_manager_create_transaction: there is "
168  "not a started transactions for this thread, "
169  "starting a new one...\n"));
170  /* allocate a new transaction object */
171  if (NULL == (tx = xta_transaction_new()))
172  THROW(NULL_OBJECT2);
173 
174  /* insert the transaction object in the hash map */
175 #if GLIB_MAJOR_VERSION == 2
176 # if GLIB_MINOR_VERSION >= 40
177  if (!g_hash_table_insert(tm->transactions, self, tx)) {
178  THROW(INTERNAL_ERROR);
179  }
180 # else
181  g_hash_table_insert(tm->transactions, self, tx);
182 # endif
183 #endif
184  } /* if (NULL == (tx = g_hash_table_lookup */
185 
186  THROW(NONE);
187  } CATCH {
188  switch (excp) {
189  case NULL_OBJECT1:
190  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
191  break;
192  case G_HASH_TABLE_NEW_ERROR:
193  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_G_HASH_TABLE_NEW_ERROR;
194  break;
195  case NULL_OBJECT2:
196  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
197  break;
198  case INTERNAL_ERROR:
199  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
200  break;
201  case NONE:
202  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
203  break;
204  default:
205  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
206  } /* switch (excp) */
207  /* recoverying memory in the event of error */
208  if (NULL_OBJECT2 < excp && NONE > excp)
209  xta_transaction_delete(tx);
210  /* clear mutex */
211  if (NULL_OBJECT1 < excp) {
212  g_mutex_unlock(&tm->mutex);
213  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_manager_create_transaction: "
214  "mutex unlocked\n"));
215  }
216  } /* TRY-CATCH */
217  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_manager_create_transaction/excp=%d/"
218  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
219  return tx;
220 }

GHashTable * transactions

xta_transaction_manager_delete

Definition: lixa_errors.h:513

void xta_transaction_delete(xta_transaction_t *transact)
